item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 18, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Google announces agreement to acquire Wiz (37 points | 15 comments)
2. The Model Is the Product (104 points | 44 comments)
3. SheepIt Render Farm server code goes open source (38 points | discuss)
4. Block YouTube ads on AppleTV by decrypting and stripping ads from Profobuf (412 points | 262 comments)
5. Wired is dropping paywalls for FOIA-based reporting. Others should follow (36 points | 1 comment)
6. Extracting DNA from the air – DNA evidence of human occupancy in indoor premises (169 points | 47 comments)
7. Show HN: I made a live multiplayer Minesweeper game (28 points | 7 comments)

11. The Dark Crystal: Age of Resistance Is a Stone-Cold Masterpiece (107 points | 41 comments)

28. Breaking Up with On-Call (87 points | 101 comments)
29. Hidden Messages in Emojis and Hacking the US Treasury (178 points | 64 comments)
